about_the_game:
Enjoy the atmospheric soundtrack of Luma Island!

You can now listen to the colourful sound palettes of each location you can visit in the game: You’ll hear folk music with banjos and accordions on the Farm, magnificent strings and harps in the Town, warm woodwinds and mystical bells in the Forest, ice cold piano harmonics and heroic brass on the mountain, all kinds of tropical mallet instruments in the jungle...

Every location tells its own musical story, crafting an unforgettable atmosphere that makes Luma Island truly come alive. Download the complete soundtrack now for free and carry the magic of the island wherever you go!

- Team Feel Free Games -
